        public ConfigHolder.Builder<T> setObjectFormat(ObjectFormat objectFormat)

        Sets the ObjectFormat to use to save and load the configuration POJO.

        By default, GsonHolder.FORMAT is used.
        Parameters:
        objectFormat - object format to use
        Returns:
        this builder

        By default, a null logger is used.
